sentences.sContent: Sorry to disturb you, but I have an urgent message.
sentences.sCn: 对不起打扰一下，我有个紧急消息。

sentences.sContent: The thieves fled when they were disturbed by a neighbour.
sentences.sCn: 窃贼们被一名邻居惊动后逃跑了。

sentences.sContent: (= a sign you put on a door so that people will not interrupt you ) .

synos.tran: 打扰；妨碍；使不安；弄乱；使恼怒

remMethod.val: dis(分开) + turb(搅动) → 搅开了 → 搅乱

words.tran: 扰乱的；为心理失常者而设的

trans.tranOther: to interrupt someone so that they cannot continue what they are doing
